These two declarations are not in conflict gato //First spanish word cat //First Spanish word's corresponding English word perro dog niña girl niño boy loro parrot triste sad feliz happy padre father madre mother //End of nine word pairs
English Spanish \n cat--------gato \n dog--------perro \n girl--------niña \n boy--------niño \n parrot--------loro \n sad--------triste \n happy--------feliz \n father--------padre \n mother--------madre \n PREV NEXT Hello, please choose which word you would like to see the translation for.
